Moureira, Diogo Luna
metadata.dc:description: In its two hundred and twenty-first ordinary meeting, held on 11 and 12 May 2011, the Brazilian Health Board approved the Resolution 441. The objective of such was to cover the legal vacuum existing in Brazil with regard to storing and using human biological material for research purposes. This article analyses said resolution.
metadata.dc:title: Los primeros pasos para la regulaci칩n de los biobancos en Brasil: la Resoluci칩n 441/2011 del Consejo Nacional de Salud.
[First steps for the regulation of biobanks in Brazil: Resolution 441/2011 of the National Council of Health].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de derecho y genoma humano = Law and the human genome review
